module.name: avm-res-desktopvirtualization-workspace
module.description: AVM Terraform Module for Desktop Virtualization Workspace

inputs.name: virtual_desktop_workspace_timeouts
diagnostic_settings
inputs.type:
map(object({
    name                                     = optional(string, null)
    log_categories                           = optional(set(string), [])
    log_groups                               = optional(set(string), ["allLogs"])
    metric_categories                        = optional(set(string), ["AllMetrics"])
    log_analytics_destination_type           = optional(string, "Dedicated")
    workspace_resource_id                    = optional(string, null)
    storage_account_resource_id              = optional(string, null)
    event_hub_authorization_rule_resource_id = optional(string, null)
    event_hub_name                           = optional(string, null)
    marketplace_partner_resource_id          = optional(string, null)
  }))

inputs.name: lock

outputs.name: resource
outputs.description: This output is the full output for the resource to allow flexibility to reference all possible values for the resource. Example usage: module.<modulename>.resource.id

outputs.name: resource_id
outputs.description: This output is the full output for the resource to allow flexibility to reference all possible values for the resource. Example usage: module.<modulename>.resource.id
